entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS @ICEgov Why didn't you act when you were warned repeatedly about the Coronavirus? Why did you push for reopening without meeting the metrics? Why are you endangering kids and teachers?
